thread.title: Staff are very friendly
thread.title_full: Staff are very friendly - Review of pentahotel Beijing, Beijing, China - TripAdvisor

author: ja2017490
title: Staff are very friendly
text: I received a happy birthday card signed by most of the staff. Thanks for making my day! The location is really good...very close to the metro station and many attraction sites. One thing I need to complain about is the room temperature is too high and dry. I was told there is only heating available in the room.
